# Test that live content doesn't appear in static HTML generation

# Generate static HTML files
md2html -html static_output -html-ext html static_test_dir
exists static_output/index.html
exists static_output/test.html

# Verify live reload script is NOT included in static HTML
! grep -q 'EventSource' static_output/test.html

# Verify connection status div is NOT included in static HTML
! grep -q 'id="status"' static_output/test.html

# Verify no live reload related JavaScript
! grep -q 'onmessage.*reload' static_output/test.html

# Verify no SSE endpoints
! grep -q '/events' static_output/test.html

# Clean up
rm -rf static_output static_test_dir
